name: CMGT_Condition_EvaluationforDateFields
description: execution logic for a Date type fields
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!valueJson: index(
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_CastJsonToMap(
      jsonText: ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.valueJson]
    ),
    "value",
    null
  ),
  local!isDate: if(
    contains(
      {
        cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_BEFORE_TODAY_OFFSET,
        cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_ON_OR_BEFORE_TODAY_OFFSET,
        cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_AFTER_TODAY_OFFSET,
        cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_ON_OR_AFTER_TODAY_OFFSET
      },
      ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.operator]
    ),
    false,
    true
  ),
  local!value: if(
    local!isDate,
    todate(local!valueJson),
    tointeger(local!valueJson)
  ),
  local!dateValue: if(
    local!isDate,
    null,
    todate(
      if(
        sign(local!value) =- 1,
        a!subtractDateTime(
          startDateTime: now(),
          days: sqrt(sumsq(local!value))
        ),
        a!addDateTime(startDateTime: now(), days: local!value)
      )
    )
  ),
  local!caseValue: todate(
    rule!CMGT_AUTO_EVAL_returnRuntimeValue(
      data: ri!data,
      field: ri!field
    )
  ),
  local!isCaseValueBlank: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(local!caseValue),
    a!match(
    value: ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.operator],
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_INCLUDES,
    then: contains(local!caseValue, local!value),
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_DOES_NOT_INCLUDE,
    then: not(
      contains(local!caseValue, local!value)
    ),
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_IS_NULL,
    then: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(value: local!caseValue),
    equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_IS_NOT_NULL,
    then: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(input: local!caseValue),
    default: if(
      local!isDate,
      a!match(
        value: ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.operator],
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_EQUAL_TO,
        then: local!caseValue = local!value,
        /*if null not equal to operator should return true*/
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_NOT_EQUAL_TO,
        then: local!caseValue <> local!value,
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_BEFORE_TODAY,
        then: if(
          local!isCaseValueBlank,
          false(),
          local!caseValue < today()
        ),
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_BEFORE_TARGET_DATE,
        then: if(
          local!isCaseValueBlank,
          false(),
          local!caseValue < local!value
        ),
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_ON_OR_BEFORE_TODAY,
        then: if(
          local!isCaseValueBlank,
          false(),
          local!caseValue <= today()
        ),
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_ON_OR_BEFORE_TARGET_DATE,
        then: if(
          local!isCaseValueBlank,
          false(),
          local!caseValue <= local!value
        ),
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_AFTER_TODAY,
        then: local!caseValue > today(),
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_AFTER_TARGET_DATE,
        then: local!caseValue > local!value,
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_ON_OR_AFTER_TODAY,
        then: local!caseValue >= today(),
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_ON_OR_AFTER_TARGET_DATE,
        then: local!caseValue >= local!value,
        default: false()
      ),
      a!match(
        value: ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.operator],
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_BEFORE_TODAY_OFFSET,
        then: if(
          local!isCaseValueBlank,
          false(),
          local!caseValue < local!dateValue
        ),
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_ON_OR_BEFORE_TODAY_OFFSET,
        then: if(
          local!isCaseValueBlank,
          false(),
          local!caseValue <= local!dateValue
        ),
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_AFTER_TODAY_OFFSET,
        then: local!caseValue > local!dateValue,
        equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_ON_OR_AFTER_TODAY_OFFSET,
        then: local!caseValue >= local!dateValue,
        default: false()
      )
    )
  )
)
